availableDataslates.name: BATTLE SISTER (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Battle Sisters are the foot soldiers of the God-Emperor. Before their thundering boltguns, countless aliens, traitors, heretics and mutants have met their doom. With voices raised in prayer, their faith forms a shield around their souls.

availableDataslates.name: BATTLE SISTER (ICON BEARER)
availableDataslates.description: These Sisters are thrice blessed to bear the holy icons known as simulacrum imperialis. Each artefact is an object offervent devotion - representations of martyred warriors, recreations of objects and deeds associated with them or repositories of their mortal remains.

abilities.name: Icon Bearer
abilities.description: When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative's APL characteristic as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier. In narrative play, this is cumulative with the Focused Battle Honour.

uniqueAction.name: Icon of Purity
uniqueAction.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while this operative is Visible to and within 3' of a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative, that friendly operative is inspired by purity. While an operative is inspired by purity, each time it fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can retain one of your attack dice results of 5+ that is a successful hit as a critical hit.

availableDataslates.name: BATTLE SISTER (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Some Sisters are blessed to receive training in the use of special-issue, close-assault weapons. These Sisters ritually maintain their storm bolters, flamers and meltaguns, which they use in battle to unleash a blistering repudiation of heresy.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: AP 2
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: MW4
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Mortal wounds. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the roll attack dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit retained, inflict x mortal wounds on the target, x is the number after the weapon's MW, e.g. MW3.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: Relentless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

availableDataslates.name: BATTLE SISTER (HEAVY GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Among the highly trained Adepta Sororitas, those Sisters granted the honour to bear the most potent armaments enable their team to engage heavily armoured opposition. Their expert eye for target prioritisation and enemy weak points makes them powerful assets.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within  of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

availableDataslates.name: BATTLE SISTER SUPERIOR
availableDataslates.description: The Sisters Superior form the crux of each squad of Battle Sisters. They speak with an authority derived from years of combat and supreme faith in the God-Emperor.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

availableDataslates.name: SISTER REPENTIA
availableDataslates.description: It is rare but not unknown for a Sister to fail in her duty, suffering disgrace as a result. Those who do are offered a chance of redemption. Stripped of armour, they are sent to wreak penitent slaughter upon the enemy with cleaving blows from brutal eviscerators.

specialRule.name: Brutal
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, your opponent can only parry with critical hits.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Reap 2
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, if you strike with a critical hit, inflict x mortal wounds on each other enemy operative Visible to the friendly operative and within 1' of it or the target operative, x is the number after the weapon's Reap (e.g. Reap 1).

specialRule.name: Brutal

abilities.name: Solace in Anguish
abilities.description: Each time this operative would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

availableDataslates.name: REPENTIA SUPERIOR
availableDataslates.description: The solemn task of guiding wayward Sisters in their atonement falls to Repentia Superior. These veterans are stern taskmasters who drive their charges forward with bellowed prayers and lashes from their neural whips, watching vigilantly for any remnant signs of sinfulness.

currentDataslates.name: SISTER REPENTIA
currentDataslates.description: It is rare but not unknown for a Sister to fail in her duty, suffering disgrace as a result. Those who do are offered a chance of redemption. Stripped of armour, they are sent to wreak penitent slaughter upon the enemy with cleaving blows from brutal eviscerators.

ploys.name: EMPEROR'S GUIDANCE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

ploys.name: DIVINE SHIELD
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical saves, you can re-roll one of your failed saves.

ploys.name: EXTREMIS TRIGGER WORD
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time a friendly ARCO-FLAGELLANT operative performs a Dash or Charge action, it can move an additional 1' for that action.
Arco-flaiIs that friendly ARCO-FLAGELLANT operatives are equipped with gain the Lethal 5+ special rule.
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

ploys.name: PENANCE THROUGH DEATH
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly SISTER REPENTIA or ARCO-FLAGELLANT operative is incapacitated in combat by an enemy operative. Before that friendly operative is removed from the killzone, select one melee weapon it is equipped with and roll one attack dice as if it is fighting in combat. If the result is a successful hit, you can immediately strike an enemy operative within Engagement Range of it. Then remove that friendly operative from the killzone as normal.

ploys.name: STORM OF RETRIBUTION
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly BATTLE SISTER GUNNER or friendly BATTLE SISTER HEAVY GUNNER operative is activated. Until the end of that operative's activation, ranged weapons it is equipped with lose the Heavy special rule (if they have it) and gain the No Cover special rule.

ploys.name: DIVINE INTERVENTION
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy in the Resolve Successful Hits step of a combat or shooting attack, when an attack dice would inflict damage on a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative. Ignore the damage inflicted from that attack dice.

equipment.name: ROSARIUS
equipment.description: LEADER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Rosarius
uniqueAction.description: This operative has a 4+ invulnerable save.

equipment.name: PHIAL OF RESTORATION
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Phial of Restoration
uniqueAction.description: Once per battle, when this operative is activated, it can use this ability. If it does so, it regains up to 2D3 lost wounds.

equipment.name: FRAG GRENADE
equipment.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Limited
specialRule.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRule.name: Blast 2
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRule.name: Indirect
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

equipment.name: KRAK GRENADE
equipment.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action:

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Limited
specialRule.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRule.name: AP 1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Indirect
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

equipment.name: PURITY SEAL
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Purity Seal
uniqueAction.description: Once per battle, when this operative is fighting in combat, making a shooting attack or a shooting attack is being made against it, you can use the Command Re-roll Tactical Ploy without spending any CP.

equipment.name: SCOURGING BARBS
equipment.description: SISTER REPENTIA operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Scourging Barbs
uniqueAction.description: Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice. If the result of that re-roll is a 1 or 2, this operative suffers 1 mortal wound.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Grunts of the Imperial Guard, Guardsmen are recruited, trained and equipped in their millions to doggedly fight wherever the Imperium needs them. They carry varying patterns of the dependable lasgun, along with any extra kit they manage to acquire.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (COMMS)
availableDataslates.description: Equipped with heavy vox-casters, comms specialists keep the team tethered to their regiment's rigid hierarchy of command, enabling them to relay their commanders' orders while reporting back on enemy troop movements or spotting for artillery.

abilities.name: Relay Orders
abilities.description: Once in each Turning Point, when this operative is issued a Guardsman Order, it can relay it. If an order is relayed, subtract 1 from this operative's APL and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives in the killzone are issued that order.

uniqueActions.name: Signal
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly GUARDSMAN operative within  of and Visible to this operative. Add 1 to the friendly operative's APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: These Guardsmen are often the team's sharpshooters, issued with additional training for the heavier weaponry they carry, and supporting their fellow soldiers with devastating anti-armour hrepower, incinerating blazes and pinpoint sniper fire.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Guardsman Sergeants coordinate their team with grizzled experience and tactical nous, enforcing their superiors' orders to ensure the success of the mission.

abilities.name: Guardsman Orders
abilities.description: Each time you use one of the Strategic Ploys below, it takes effect as a Guardsman Order. All friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives, and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives within  of and Visible to a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD LEADER operative, are issued that Guardsman Order.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Tempestus Scions are an elite force within the Astra Militarum, equipped with specialist wargear to conduct dangerous missions. They typically bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear dense carapace armour that provides extra protection in deadly kill zones.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (COMMS)
availableDataslates.description: Bearing advanced vox-casters, these Scions provide updated tactical information, keeping their team in contact with regimental headquarters. Some are also trained in counter-intelligence and the interception of signals, allowing their team to outmanoeuvre the foe.

uniqueActions.name: Signal
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operative in the killzone. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives. This operative can perform this action more than once during its activation.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Tempestus Scions have access to more specialist weapons than most infantry regiments. Those issued with them act as fire support for the rest of their team, blasting open pathways and eliminating threats that would jeopardise the success of the mission.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng . All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent .

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng . All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent .

specialRule.name: AP 1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Blast 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: AP 2
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: MW4
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Mortal wounds. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the roll attack dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit retained, inflict x mortal wounds on the target, x is the number after the weapon's MW, e.g. MW3.

specialRule.name: AP 2

If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Hot
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each attack dice result of 1 that is discarded, that operative suffers three mortal wounds.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTOR
availableDataslates.description: Skilled tacticians and leaders, Tempestors design the kill zone insertions that the Scions are justifiably famed for. They are also granted prestige weapons normally restricted to high-ranking officers, making them devastatingly effective fighters in their own right.

specialRule.name: Brutal
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, your opponent can only parry with critical hits.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

abilities.name: Guardsman Orders
abilities.description: Each time you use one of the Strategic Ploys below, it takes effect as a Guardsman Order. All friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives, and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives within  of and Visible to a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD LEADER operative, are issued that Guardsman Order.

abilities.name: Accomplished Leader
abilities.description: In each of your Strategy phases, if this operative is in the killzone, you can use one Strategic Ploy without spending any Command Points.

currentDataslates.description: Tempestus Scions are an elite force within the Astra Militarum, equipped with specialist wargear to conduct dangerous missions. They typically bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear dense carapace armour that provides extra protection in deadly kill zones.

ploys.name: TAKE AIM!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

ploys.name: TAKE COVER!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it is in Cover, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice results of 1.

ploys.name: FIX BAYONETS!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

ploys.name: MOVE! MOVE! MOVE!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order is activated, until the end of that activation, add 1' to its Movement characteristic.

ploys.name: SPECIAL FORCES
ploys.description: Select the Pick up action or one mission action friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives can perform. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operative is activated, it can perform that action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0AP).

ploys.name: BRING IT DOWN!
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy after a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time another friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack against the target of that shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that subsequent shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

equipment.name: FRAG GRENADE
equipment.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Limited
specialRule.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRule.name: Blast 2

X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRule.name: Indirect
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

equipment.name: KRAK GRENADE
equipment.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action:

equipment.name: MEDIKIT
equipment.description: The operative gains the MEDIC keyword until the start of the next battle and can perform the following action during the battle:

unitAction.name: MEDIKIT
unitAction.description: Select one friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative within 1' of and Visible to this operative. That operative regains 2D3 lost wounds. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

equipment.name: CARAPACE ARMOUR
equipment.description: GUARDSMAN operative only. The operative has a 4+ Save characteristic for the battle.

equipment.name: SCION BLADE
equipment.description: TEMPESTUS SCION operative only. The operative is equipped with the following melee weapon for the battle:

equipment.name: REGIMENTAL STANDARD
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Regimental Standard
uniqueAction.description: When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative's APL as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier. In narrative play, this is cumulative with the Focused Battle Honour.

equipment.body: The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

unitAction.name: PLANT THE STANDARD
unitAction.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while this operative is Visible to and within 3' of a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative with the same <REGIMENT> or <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT> keyword as this operative, that friendly operative is inspired by the regimental standard. While an operative is inspired by the regimental standard, each time a shooting attack is made against it, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

availableDataslates.name: SKITARII RANGER (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Skitarii Rangers hunt the foes of the Machine God relentlessly, and their bionically enhanced stamina is legendary. They pursue like patient predators, inexorably tracking their prey before taking the killing shot with their long rifles of ancient design.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

availableDataslates.name: SKITARII RANGER (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: In the hunt for the most dangerous of hereteks or xenos aggressors, a forge world's ruling Tech-Priests may issue high-performing Rangers with advanced weaponry. Strange, esoteric technologies power such armaments, rendering them lethal indeed to the Rangers' foes.

availableDataslates.description: Ranger Alphas are the most dedicated of their kind, relied upon to formulate reconnaissance and hunting parameters, and to lead their unit in gruelling duties.

currentDataslates.name: SKITARII RANGER (TROOPER)
currentDataslates.description: Skitarii Rangers hunt the foes of the Machine God relentlessly, and their bionically enhanced stamina is legendary. They pursue like patient predators, inexorably tracking their prey before taking the killing shot with their long rifles of ancient design.

specialRule.name: Heavy

availableDataslates.name: SKITARII VANGUARD (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Skitarii Vanguard are so infused with baleful energies that simply being near them is deadly. So much radiation bleeds out from the shells fired by their radium carbines that they contaminate the air around them, as well as their targets.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Rending
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits you can retain one normal hit as a critical hit.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Rending
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits you can retain one normal hit as a critical hit.

availableDataslates.name: SKITARII VANGUARD (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Many of the most powerful forge world weapons are potentially hazardous to the wielder. Vanguard marksmen, however, are already inured to the irradiating effects of their wargear - a price they willingly pay in devotion to their techno-arcane religion.

specialRule.name: AP1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

specialRule.description: An operative can only make a shooting attack with this weapon if an extra AP is subtracted to perform a Shoot action. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: MW2
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Mortal wounds. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the roll attack dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit retained, inflict x mortal wounds on the target, x is the number after the weapon's MW, e.g. MW3.

availableDataslates.name: SKITARII VANGUARD ALPHA
availableDataslates.description: Skitarii Alphas have passed a point called the Crux Mechanicus. With bodies more machine than flesh, they enact Tech-Priest overseers' orders like holy commands.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'

specialRule.name: Blast 1'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. availableDataslates.name: SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: The Ruststalkers fall upon their foes in a stabbing, slashing frenzy. Their transonic blades are wielded in a blur of attacks, capable of bypassing armour.

availableDataslates.name: SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER (PRINCEPS)
availableDataslates.description: Excelling in assassination missions and surprise attacks, Princeps lead their Ruststalkers in the hunt for any their Tech-Priest masters have marked for death.

availableDataslates.name: SICARIAN INFILTRATOR (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Experts in penetrating enemy strongholds, Sicarian Infiltrators emit a white noise that attacks their foes' sensoriums with a painful neurostatic bombardment.

specialRule.name: Ceaseless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRule.name: Relentless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Ceaseless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

ploys.name: PROTECTOR IMPERATIVE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you must re-roll one of your successful hits.
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

ploys.name: CONQUEROR IMPERATIVE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you must re-roll one of your successful hits.
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

ploys.name: BULWARK IMPERATIVE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly FORGE WORLD operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.
Subtract 2' from the Movement characteristic of friendly FORGE WORLD operatives.
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

ploys.name: AGGRESSOR IMPERATIVE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative performs a Normal Move or Charge action, it can move an additional 1'.
Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly FORGE WORLD operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you must re-roll one of your successful saves.
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

ploys.name: NEUROSTATIC INTERFERENCE
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy at the start of the Firefight phase. Select one enemy operative Visible to and within 6' of a friendly INFILTRATOR operative. Until the end of the Turning Point, that enemy operative cannot be activated until another enemy operative has been activated (unless it is the only remaining enemy operative).

ploys.name: CONTROL EDICT
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when you activate a ready friendly FORGE WORLD LEADER operative. Select one other ready friendly FORGE WORLD operative Visible to and within 3' of that LEADER operative. At the end of that LEADER operative's activation, you can activate that other ready friendly operative.

equipment.name: ENHANCED BIONICS
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Enhanced Bionics
uniqueAction.description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice results of 1.

equipment.name: OMNISPEX
equipment.description: The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

unitAction.name: OMNISPEX
unitAction.description: Select one friendly FORGE WORLD operative within 3' of and Visible to this operative, then select one enemy operative. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time that friendly operative makes a shooting attack, for that shooting attack:
subText: That enemy operative is not Obscured.
If that enemy operative is the target, that friendly operative's ranged weapons have the No Cover special rule.
unitAction.postSubText: This operative cannot perform a Shoot or Fight action in the same activation in which it performs this action. An operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

equipment.name: UPLINKED VID-FEED
equipment.description: RANGER or VANGUARD operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Uplinked Vid-feed
uniqueAction.description: Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action's shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

equipment.name: CENSE BEARER
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Cense Bearer
uniqueAction.description: Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative within 2' of and Visible to this operative is activated, if it is injured, do not subtract 2' from its Movement characteristic for that activation.

equipment.name: SERVO-SKULL
equipment.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

uniqueAction.name: Servo-skull
uniqueAction.description: This operative can perform mission actions for one less AP (to a minimum of 0AP).

equipment.name: DATA-TETHER
equipment.description: The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

unitAction.name: DATA-TETHER
unitAction.description: You gain 1CP. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

availableDataslates.name: INTERCESSOR (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Space Marines equipped to fight as Intercessors lay down punishing volleys of fire from their bolt rifles. Their tactics and wargear are adaptable to countless situations, and they form the core of many Chapters' battle companies.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

specialRule.name: Ceaseless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1

Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: AP1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Torrent 1'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: Hot

specialRule.name: Brutal
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, your opponent can only parry with critical hits.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

availableDataslates.name: INCURSOR (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Incursors fulfil an aggressive, close-quarters gunfighting role within the Adeptus Astartes. Fed with targeting data from their backpack-mounted auspexes, they can detect their foes through dense smoke, atmospheric phenomena and even solid walls.

specialRule.name: No Cover
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, for that shooting attack, defence dice cannot be automatically retained as a result of Cover (they must be rolled instead).

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR WARRIOR
availableDataslates.description: The flexible armour worn by Infiltrators enables them to advance quickly and stealthily. They frequently attack behind enemy lines, disrupting communications and silencing key targets. Their omni-scramblers and unerring kill shots sow discord and fear among the foe.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Sergeants of Infiltrator teams drill their charges in self-sufficiency and survival techniques, preparing them for extended missions without Chapter support. Patient and imaginative tacticians, they guide their brothers in outflanking manoeuvres and long-range reconnaissance.

specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

currentDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR WARRIOR
currentDataslates.description: The flexible armour worn by Infiltrators enables them to advance quickly and stealthily. They frequently attack behind enemy lines, disrupting communications and silencing key targets. Their omni-scramblers and unerring kill shots sow discord and fear among the foe.

availableDataslates.name: REIVER (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Reivers are rapid-insertion terror troops without compare. They wear Phobos armour that allows them to stalk their foes in silence, but when they strike, Reivers unleash shock grenades and sonic waves that emit amplified roars as they gut the foe with combat knives.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: AP1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

availableDataslates.name: REIVER SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Reiver Sergeants lead teams of skull-masked warriors in unpredictable shock assaults that spread terror through enemy lines. They meticulously plot their insertion strategies, whether advancing through tangled ruins or using grapnels to scale vast heights.

availableDataslates.name: HEAVY INTERCESSOR (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Shielded by extremely thick armour, Heavy Intercessors are capable of securing key objectives and holding them against an onslaught of foes. They are immovable in defence, and their volleys of heavy firepower keep ail but the most foolhardy enemies at bay.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: AP1

specialRule.name: Ceaseless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

availableDataslates.name: HEAVY INTERCESSOR (HEAVY GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Heavy Intercessors are assigned even more powerful bolt weapons than their brothers. They are enormous, rapid-firing guns that leave a bloody trail of destruction.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

availableDataslates.name: TACTICAL MARINE (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Dependable and flexible, Space Marines assigned to Tactical Squads are called upon to fulfil a wide range of battlefield roles. When armed with the boltgun, they can hold ground, provide fire support and unload suppressive salvoes while rapidly advancing.

availableDataslates.name: TACTICAL MARINE (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Space Marines train with countless weapon types in support of their flexible role. Depending on the mission, they wield thermal weapons to melt armour, infantry-roasting flamers or ancient firearms that discharge dangerous energy.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: AP 1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Grav*

availableDataslates.name: TACTICAL MARINE (HEAVY GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Far too large to be wielded by any unaugmented Human, the heaviest weaponry can overturn a tank, demolish signal arrays and obliterate most enemies.

specialRule.name: Heavy'
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. currentDataslates.name: TACTICAL MARINE (WARRIOR)
currentDataslates.description: Dependable and flexible, Space Marines assigned to Tactical Squads are called upon to fulfil a wide range of battlefield roles. When armed with the boltgun, they can hold ground, provide fire support and unload suppressive salvoes while rapidly advancing.

availableDataslates.name: SCOUT (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Scouts are Chapter recruits, part way through the genetic transformation to become full Space Marines. They conduct reconnaissance missions, commando raids, ambushes and sabotage runs, mastering the whole gamut of skills to be judged true battle brothers.

availableDataslates.name: SCOUT (HEAVY GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Scouts must become proficient with a wide variety of armaments, and their dangerous missions often demand powerful support. A heavy bolter is a common addition to a unit's firepower, as is a missile launcher with its flexible and optional payloads.

specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within  of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

specialRule.name: Limited
specialRule.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRule.name: Combi*
specialRule.description: An operative equipped with this weapon is also equipped with a boltgun.

specialRule.name: AP 1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Grav*
specialRule.description: Each time this operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, if the target has an unmodified Save characteristic of 3+ or better, this weapon has the Lethal 4+ special rule for that attack.

specialRule.name: Limited
specialRule.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

availableDataslates.name: DEATHWATCH VETERAN (HEAVY GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: These Deathwatch Veterans bear the most potent of xenos-killing firepower, and support kill teams facing especially dangerous horrors.

specialRule.name: Heavy'
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: Fusillade
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: P1
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Blast 2'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast . An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRule.name: Heavy
specialRule.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRule.name: AP1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Relentless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRule.name: Relentless
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

specialRule.name: Brutal
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, your opponent can only parry with critical hits.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

criticalHitspecialRule.name: Stun
criticalHitspecialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

abilities.name: Storm Shield
abilities.description: If this operative is equipped with a storm shield:
subText: It has a 4+ invulnerable save.
Each time it fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, each time it parries, two of your opponent's successful hits are discarded (instead of one).

abilities.name: *Grav
abilities.description: Each time this operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, if the target has an unmodified Save characteristic of 3+ or better, this weapon has the Lethal 4+ special rule for that attack.

currentDataslates.name: DEATHWATCH VETERAN (FIGHTER)
currentDataslates.description: Those Deathwatch Veterans who excel in bloody close combat wield a variety of pistols, blades and powered hammers that can pulverise almost any foe.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Lethal 5+
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRule.name: AP 1
specialRule.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRule.name: Grav*
specialRule.description: Each time this operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, if the target has an unmodified Save characteristic of 3+ or better, this weapon has the Lethal 4+ special rule for that attack.

specialRule.name: Rng 6'
specialRule.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRule.name: Torrent 1'
specialRule.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.
